item.description:
The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group has held monthly events for some time now, and as much fun as they are, I see an opportunity for another monthly gathering.  This will not only give people a second chance to gather with like-minded individuals each month, but we'll mix up the setting and location a bit too: Let's meet for drinks at a rotating location.

This month we'll meet in Central Square -- a nice, centrally-located destination, easy to get to while it's still cold out.  Let's just meet at the C3 (Clear Conscience Cafe: http://www.c3cafe.net/), because it will be easier to find one another that way.  But after thirty or forty minutes, we'll roll out to one of the local pubs -- e.g., The Asgard.

Consider bringing along a friend or two, libertarian-leaning or not.  I hope we can spur some excitement around this monthly gathering, and add some more cohesion to the Boston libertarian scene (which hardly exists yet -- despite the fact that I meet libertarians all the time).  I hope this event will become something people look forward to every month! :)

Feel free to call/text my phone if you have trouble finding us or plan to show up later: 614-582-5901
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't spot us, call my phone: 614-582-5901
item.why: People like to go out on Thursday nights anyway!

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Drinks and socializing, with a libertarian theme
